file_content.text: Sir, the Sith's strength has been spent obliterating our enemy. We should strike while there's a chance.
After that display, Weggland, I believe fighting should be our last resort. Stay back and cover me.
Sith, I am Commander Naughlen. I'm in charge of this defensive. I'm unarmed.
Have your men follow suit. Now.
Surrender.
All weapons down!
You heard the commander, power down your weapons!
You risk much approaching me weaponless.
You're taking a big chance.
I doubt that a blaster would save me.
We do not wish a fight, but we also cannot relinquish this area. What are your terms?
You live only by my good grace. I may have need of you someday, and you will repay my mercy.
You're safe, Commander.
Very well. If your mission does not conflict with Republic interests, I pledge to help you.
Here is my holofrequency. I will answer your call, you have my word. Until we meet again, Sith.
My enemy has been defeated here. I'll leave you in peace.
You're safe, Commander.
You... have my thanks.
Men, the battle is ended. Attend to the wounded!
Here are my terms. [Kill]
That was a grave mistake.
You die. [Kill Naughlen]
Ahhgg!
No! Men, fire at will!
Look lively, men, it looks like we have a Sith to contend with, too.
You are now in my debt.
